result.reason: The RDP ActiveX control limits MaxReconnectAttempts to 20, but we can implement a manual redial loop in RdpProtocol.cs to support higher limits.
result.approach: Cap the ActiveX MaxReconnectAttempts at 20 to prevent errors, then implement a manual reconnection handler in OnDisconnected to continue attempting connections up to the user-defined limit.
